verses.name: Daniel 6:7
verses.text: All the presidents of the kingdom, the governors, and the princes, the counsellors, and the captains, have consulted together to establish a royal statute, and to make a firm decree, that whosoever shall ask a petition of any God or man for thirty days, save of thee, O king, he shall be cast into the den of lions.

verses.name: Daniel 6:8
verses.text: Now, O king, establish the decree, and sign the writing, that it be not changed, according to the law of the Medes and Persians, which altereth not.

verses.name: Daniel 6:9
verses.text: Wherefore king Darius signed the writing and the decree.
